Package org.ejbca.ra

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RaCertificateDetails.Callbacks  
    RaEndEntityDetails.Callbacks  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApprovalRequestGUIInfo
    Keeps localized information about an approval request.
    ApprovalRequestGUIInfo.ApprovalGuiObject  
    ApprovalRequestGUIInfo.ApprovalPartitionProfileGuiObject
    A display POJO for approval partitions.
    ApprovalRequestGUIInfo.RequestDataRow  
    ApprovalRequestGUIInfo.Step
    Represents a step that has been approved
    ApprovalRequestGUIInfo.StepOption  
    EnrollMakeNewRequestBean
    Managed bean that backs up the enrollingmakenewrequest.xhtml page.
    EnrollWithRequestIdBean
    Managed bean that backs up the enrollwithrequestid.xhtml page
    EnrollWithUsernameBean
    Managed bean that backs up the enrollwithusername.xhtml page.
    LocaleConverter
    Used in preferences section of RA GUI to convert selected locale and make it digestible by Preferences.xhtml and vice versa.
    RaAbstractDn
    Represents two APIs: list (needed for JSF) and map for the DN fields of the specified end entity profile.
    RaAccessBean
    Managed bean with isAuthorized method.
    RaAuthenticationBean
    JSF Managed Bean for handling authentication of clients.
    RaAuthenticationHelper
    Web session authentication helper.
    RaCasPageBean
    Backing bean for Certificate and CRLs download page.
    RaCertDistServlet
    Servlet for download of CA certificates and chains.
    RaCertificateDetails
    UI representation of a certificate from the back end.
    RadioButtonConverter
    Handles conversions of radio buttons from the UI.
    RaEndEntityBean
    Backing bean for certificate details view.
    RaEndEntityBean.SelectStatus
    The SelectStatus class holds a status string/constant pair
    RaEndEntityDetails
    UI representation of a result set item from the back end.
    RaEndEntityTools
    Tools to handle common RA End Entity operations.
    RaErrorBean
    Bean used to display a summary of unexpected errors and debug log the cause.
    RaExampleBean
    Example of JSF Managed Bean for backing a page.
    RaLocaleBean
    JSF Managed Bean for handling localization of clients.
    RaManageRequestBean
    Backing bean for Manage Request page (for individual requests).
    RaManageRequestsBean
    Backing bean for Manage Requests page (for a list of requests)
    RaPreferencesBean
    This is the backing bean supporting the preferences.xhtml page in RA web.
    RaRequestPreview
    UI representation of a certificate preview to be confirmed before enrollment.
    RaRoleBean
    Backing bean for the Edit Role page
    RaRoleMemberBean
    Backing bean for the (Add) Role Member page
    RaRoleMemberGUIInfo  
    RaRoleMembersBean
    Backing bean for the Role Members page
    RaRolesBean
    Backing bean for the Roles page
    RaSearchCertsBean
    Backing bean for Search Certificates page.
    RaSearchEesBean
    Backing bean for Search Certificates page.
    RaSessionKeepAliveServlet
    Servlet for receiving AJAX requests that keeps the HTTP session alive.
    RaViewCertBean
    Backing bean for certificate details view.
    StringConverter
    When using dynamic properties, JSF can't handle String conversions for some strange reason.
    SubjectAlternativeName
    Contains Subject Alternative Name attributes
    SubjectDirectoryAttributes
    Contains Subject Directory attributes
    SubjectDn
    Represents two "interfaces": list (needed for JSF) and map interface for the subject DN fields of the specified end entity profile.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EnrollMakeNewRequestBean.KeyPairGeneration
    Is private key generated by the server (CA) or is the key provided by the user (usually in the form of a CSR)
